gameDetails.name: Too Many Bones: The Gearloc Child Promo
gameDetails.description:
Are you looking to enhance your Too Many Bones experience while also celebrating your love of a popular streaming service miniseries set in a galaxy far, far away? That is a very specific set of interests, but look no further than The Gearloc Child, the one and only product in the Too Many Bones ManDaelorean collection.

The Gearloc Child (known as “Baby Ghillie” by the less pedantic) functions as an undroppable and heavy piece of Too Many Bones loot -- so heavy, in fact, that he comes with his own miniature character sheet. It’s your job to keep The Gearloc Child safe on your adventures, but will you be helped or hurt by his unpredictable powers? We have a bad feeling about this...
